Uses of Class
com.moomoohk.Grame.Core.Base

Packages that use Base
com.moomoohk.Grame.Basics Contains some helpful classes which utilize the core. 
com.moomoohk.Grame.Basics.AI Contains some MovementAI classes. 
com.moomoohk.Grame.Core Contains the core classes of the engine. 
com.moomoohk.Grame.Core.Graphics Contains graphics related classes such as Render types. 
com.moomoohk.Grame.GrassMuncher A demo game I made with Grame. 
com.moomoohk.Grame.test Contains some test classes which shouldn't be touched or interacted with.

Methods in com.moomoohk.Grame.Core that return Base
static Base GrameManager.findBase(int id)
          Finds and returns a Base from the Base list.
If the Base is not found, null will be returned.
